thread.title: FRN Variable Rate Fix

title: FRN Variable Rate Fix
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Tue, Jul 21, 2015, 15:38 BST - UK Markets close in 52 mins. FRN Variable Rate Fix PLEASE BE ADVISED THAT THE INTEREST RATE FOR THE PERIOD 20-Jul-2015 TO 20-Aug-2015 HAS BEEN FIXED AT 0.75 PCT INTEREST PAYABLE VALUE 20-Aug-2015 WILL AMOUNT TO: GBP 7.86 PER GBP 12,311.78 DENOMINATION View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20150721006050/en/ Contact Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
